website_summaries.verdict: Affordable gel polishes in rich reds and bold blacks for an edgy, fashionable look.
pros: Brush is sturdy and comfortable to use
Simple application for first-timers, as well as salon professionals
Detailed instructions for how to achieve salon-like results
cons: May not last as long as promised
Need to purchase top and base coat separately and cure under an LED lamp for desired results

customer_reviews.title: No color names.
customer_reviews.text: Colors are true to the picture. Great basics and very pretty colors! The only downside is there's no color names or swatches on the bottle. Just the color number on the top of the bottle but how am I supposed to know what the number means without opening every bottle to find the color I want. I created my own swatches and put them on the bottles.
customer_reviews.author: Cody Keith

customer_reviews.title: Amazing. Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: So just like anyone else I was tired of paying so much to go and wait at a salon for my nails to be done. So I ordered everything I needed and decided to give it at try. First try and it came out amazing. Couldn't be happier with the polish, and the price!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Cabrera

customer_reviews.title: Empty Bottle!!!
customer_reviews.text: Make sure to check all bottles when you get them. Ordered these and one bottle has no nail polish or brush in it. Will be returning and re-purchasing. Hopefully it won’t happen again. Will update when new box is recieved.
customer_reviews.author: Erick Bernal

customer_reviews.title: Great in home manicure
customer_reviews.text: So far I’ve done my nails and my sisters and I love this product!!! I cured each layer 2 mins and they came out perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Mother_Of_LO_Dragons

customer_reviews.title: I really liked these colors and they apply really well
customer_reviews.text: I really liked these colors and they apply really well. The problem for is is that they don’t last as long as when going to the salon and having them done. I wash my hands a lot and with doing dishes and laundry, it chips off at the front of the nail and lifts up so it starts to peel off. If they lasted longer I would love these even more.
customer_reviews.author: Lea

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the quality I expected.
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't expecting high end polish, considering these are ~ $3.17 each. None of the colors are opaque in 2 coats. You need at least 3 coats for full coverage and ain't nobody got time for that. The two greys were the most difficult to remove. I had to soak for 20+ minutes then scrape, file, and soak some more. But I'm still getting the hang of gel polish and these met my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Recommended!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use! Love all the colors. The smell is not so strong as others brands. It last even two months in my toes. Has to take it off because they just grew up of course.
customer_reviews.author: Perlita C

customer_reviews.title: No color names?
customer_reviews.text: Why don’t they have color swatches or names?? Haven’t tried these on the nail yet but it’s just funny to me that there’s no way to tell what color is which unless you want to memorize the color numbers. So I just cured some dots on a piece of paper and glued them to the top. Lol.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it so far!
customer_reviews.text: I just did my nails so I can't speak to the longevity of the gel, however it went on smoothly. I used a base coat, 2 coats of color, and a top coat. Sealed the free edge. It cured perfectly. It's shiny. Looks beautiful. As long as it lasts, it is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Mommy of 6!

customer_reviews.title: but so far I am in love. My nails look so good
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Classic Elegance colors and used the 025 color first. I just did my nails last night using the gelish foundation and top coat. I will update my review according to how long they last, but so far I am in love. My nails look so good! Now I’m just hoping they last at least 2 weeks lol (usually how long a salon gel manicure will last on me).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous High Quality Polishes that LAST!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these gel polishes! This color palette is beautiful, they apply evenly and you can achieve full coverage in just about two coats. I have had to cure some of my nails an extra minute or two to avoid stickiness, so if you notice a tacky feel just reapply the polish or top coat and cure an extra minute. Should fix the issue. These polishes last SO LONG! I am super impressed. I can go a full week to ten days without any chipping at ALL... I've only removed my polish because the regrowth at my cuticle gets to be too much and I am ready for a new color. Definitely recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: Abby

customer_reviews.title: Love the colors!
customer_reviews.text: Love having multiple colors to choose from. The bottles are smaller but that works well since I’m only doing mine and my daughter’s nails. I would probably never finish a full size bottle. Value for the money is great!
customer_reviews.author: Penny W.

customer_reviews.title: Good nail polish
customer_reviews.text: I received the colors i ordered. The polish went on great. It does explain on the boz to forstbapply one coat, cure then apply another coat. I did this and the polish was great. My nails are so shiny, you can see the reflection of my picture frames on my wall.
customer_reviews.author: Sg,Ca

customer_reviews.title: Peels off in days
customer_reviews.text: The colors are nice, but they peel off in a couple of days. I've tried every color and have been using them for 2 months so its not a fluke one time thing. Every time I'd use them they would peel off in a couple of days. And its not an error in my application bc I use Gelish brand polish and it last 2 weeks. Don't waste your money. Polish doesn't act like gel and will peel in days.
customer_reviews.author: mrsg821

customer_reviews.title: Holding up well
customer_reviews.text: The first time I used this at home, it came off after about a week, but ti was the first time I had ever done my own gel nails. The second time, it went much better. The polish is still on without chips after over a week. I am a single mom and do a lot of handy work, dishes, etc. and they are holding up surprisingly well. They also peel off, so I didn't have to soak them like gel nails usually need (I did use with a primer and top coat, so I don't know if that is why). I will buy this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Kirstin Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Great polish! stays for up to 2 weeks.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this brand of gel polish. It can last up to 2 weeks (depending on how fast your nails grow) I replace mine usually every ween and half just because my nails grow fast and it doesnt look that great after that long. I have tried several brands of gel polish and this is by far one of my favorite!
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: The formula doesn't cure properly!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a veterinary technician and I bought these to protect my natural nails from frequent handwashing. They apply easily but will not fully cure under a lamp, even for an extended amount of time. The worst offender was the black (which is the color I wanted the most!) This leaves you with an uneven nail surface, bubbles, or melting effect. When the gel does seem cured, it would peel off within a day and leave a sticky residue underneath. For reference I used the Gellen brand base coat and top coat with these colors + UV lamp.
customer_reviews.author: Sigynsaeth

customer_reviews.title: I love all the colors so far
customer_reviews.text: I love all the colors so far! I only have the purple left to try out. I've received so many compliments on my manis from so many people. The colors last for 2-3 weeks without chipping, even after doing dishes, cleaning, etc. Will definitely be ordering other colors.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product and a much better price than my regular ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product and a much better price than my regular polish. Goes on a little thin but not runny at all. The colors are beautiful and they all cure beautifully with my LED lamp. I will definitely be purchasing these again in other colors to add to my collection.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany A.

customer_reviews.title: Color lasts for at least two weeks without any peeling or bubbling
customer_reviews.text: I've been very pleased with this polish - most of the colors in the set are wearable. You get good coverage with just two thin coats so my acrylic nails don't look or feel too "thick" and the polish has proven to be very durable. I get it changed and reapplied every two weeks by my nail professional and I've never had any issues with this polish peeling or bubbling in between reapplications. My only complaint is that you cannot tell the color of the polish without opening each bottle. They are only referenced by number, instead of a policy name - and since the bottle is black, you can't tell the color inside without opening.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Loved these colors!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these based on reviews and I really like them. I think the polish goes on really smooth and looks great. Obviously, it isn't salon gel, but I thought this worked really well. I can't get regular polish to go 24 hours without chipping and this stayed on with no problems for 7-10 days for me.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis Puzzella

customer_reviews.title: Deteriorates nails...
customer_reviews.text: Received multiple shades of black polishes 2 of the colors werent present. No color chart to know what the colors were without having to open each one. And worst of all they completely f'ck my nails up. Used twice in 3 weeks and my nails have completely dried out and keep chipping. Never in my life had my nails been the chipping/splintering kind. Waiting for my healthy growth to grow out and have to keep nubbing them down til then, Another first.
customer_reviews.author: Hawk12

customer_reviews.title: Love it !
customer_reviews.text: Love it ! I was very impressed when I received my package. It looked very high quality and I can definitely say it surpassed my expectations. I had no problem while doing my nails. And they came out beautifully, my sister was impressed too and even made me do hers. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Daisy

customer_reviews.title: Hopefully others had better luck than me 😕
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love these 😕 unfortunately they didn’t hold up well at all for me. I done my daughters nails one night and after bath time the following night they were completely gone, I love that they are fast drying which with little ones is always a plus! ( I did use a UV lamp as well)
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: HORRIBLE polish!
customer_reviews.text: We used the LED/UV light as mentioned and it NEVER dried, stayed tacky for hours. Then it wrinkled and looked so bad. Would not recommend this product at all.A lthough it states- REMINDER: Cure under LED/UV light CURE TIME: Average for LED light 30-60 secs, UV light 2-4mins. This is not true, if you read the back of the polish it says not to.
customer_reviews.author: Beebs

customer_reviews.title: Wont buy again
customer_reviews.text: The color takes 3-4 coats for coverage so it's pretty thick by the time you are done. 6 coats of gel is not easy to get off. Also color bottles are black and numbered not labeled so you have to open them or mark the bottles and cure them to know what's in them. Just not a very well thought out product. Don't recommend..

customer_reviews.title: Great polish
customer_reviews.text: This is some great quality gel polish and it's such a great price. I've tried every brand of gel out there from CND to OPI and this stayed on longer than my OPI manicures did. The only color I'm not thrilled about is the white. It never becomes opaque enough.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Rich Salon quality on trend colors!
customer_reviews.text: If your looking for a sampling of rich salon quality gel colors this set is for you! Note these aren’t full size bottles but being nail polish gets old And tacky quickly this is the perfect size for a at home diy gel manicure and have a nice variety of colors! At this price point can’t beat it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One bottle of polish not filled. Good set though.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this set because I bought all equipment to do my own acrylics and gel manicures at home. 3 stars because the taupe bottle from my set wasn't even filled. It had enough product to maybe paint one nail, but the rest of the colors had a sufficient amount of polish. It takes a little practice with gel polish, be sure to apply thin coats otherwise it will warp and will have sticky polish residue. Also be sure to completely cure your gel mani and top coat it. The polish works good, can't compare to other polishes since this is the only brand I've tried myself. I'll try to update with wear time and chipping if I remember.
customer_reviews.author: kaylannie

customer_reviews.title: Unlucky I suppose:(
customer_reviews.text: Yo! Don’t know which bottles I got but I literally had to buy a whole new brand. The colors were fine it just never got hard even with using the uv light it was very soft like and kept coming off the same day. I know it’s the brand because I ordered a new brand Beetles and it works perfectly. Also Amazon denies refunds so I wasn’t able to even able to get my money back and I paid more for the Gellen:( Again maybe my bottles were unlucky🙄
customer_reviews.author: Shayla d

customer_reviews.title: Love it. I already bought another set if colors.
customer_reviews.text: I used these with the Gellen base and top coat. I love it. I have already saved hundreds in the last few months doing my nails myself. The gel stays for atleast 2 weeks. I live not having to worry about going in for an appointment. Tip: less is more when it come to base coat and top coat (stay away from your cuticles). The color will stick to wherever ryou put the base coat, so keep it clean on that steam
customer_reviews.author: Juhls

customer_reviews.title: Easiest to apply
customer_reviews.text: I used this set with the gellen base and top coat (wipe required on top). This is the shiniest gel! The bond is great to the nail. You will need to apply 3 coats of color. The polish is not to thick so it’s easier to apply than other brands. This is my go to favorite brand.
customer_reviews.author: laura w anderson

customer_reviews.title: Great affordable option
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Thick, opaque gels that only need one coat at times. Easy to work with. Update: I took away one star because this gel polish is more difficult to remove compared to others. Not sure if it's the color or the top/base coat.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased a different color set made by the same brand. The bottles for the other set are in white, round bottles. My nails last about two weeks with that set. These ones do not seem to wear as well. I can’t get more than a week out of my manicure with this one. Too bad because I love the colors!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: VERY Disappointing...
customer_reviews.text: Big disappointment. How can they expect the user to know which container to use when they are NOT marked in a way that you can tell which color it is? There is a sticker on top of applicator but NO guide is included to tell you what the number on sticker represents. Craziness.
customer_reviews.author: TG

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't cure
customer_reviews.text: This product would not cure under the UV device I have. I have used other gel nail products without difficulty with the lamp I have. I tried multiple times and shook the bottles vigorously. Maybe it's the lamp I have, but other gel products have cured just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I was a little skeptical at first bc i thought that it would look cheap and tacky but i was wrong. Polish went on smoothly with a great shine. I will most definitely order more in different colors.
customer_reviews.author: X

customer_reviews.title: nice colors but does NOT curate well
customer_reviews.text: horrible nailpolish. i bought two different brands at the same time and this one did not cure well. it curls up and peels within minutes. the Aimeili brand worked better for me. I have an LED light.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce H. Kim

customer_reviews.title: Ehh.
customer_reviews.text: These don’t work for me. I have a UV light and a complete Gelish Gel Polish Set. But every time I use a color, it comes off once I put the gel coat on and I use nail polish remover to remove the sticky residue from the gel coat. I let each layer cure as instructed, but it still comes off. So I’m sure not if it’s just me or if the product is not defective.
customer_reviews.author: Casey G.

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the try
customer_reviews.text: I thought this would be worth a try for the price, but don’t bother. It’s extremely difficult to apply evenly and finishes with a slightly lumpy rubbery texture. Also, it only lasted 4 days before it started peeling. I’m giving 2 stars instead of 1 because my nails did look ok for those four days. It just took a much longer time than usual to get them to look decent.
customer_reviews.author: LauraK

customer_reviews.title: Broken brush, not consistent formula
customer_reviews.text: I like this brand typically, however this came with a completely broken brush in the white and some colors are much thicker than others.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Anger

customer_reviews.title: They’re ok
customer_reviews.text: Polish itself is nice. A few coats needed to be opaque. The colors are not quite what they look like in the picture. More bland
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: rather annoying when all the bottles are black and look exactly ...
customer_reviews.text: None of the bottles tell you the color of the polish inside, rather annoying when all the bottles are black and look exactly the same. Polish does not ‘set’ as well as other gel polishes I have purchased even when using the UV lamp. Pretty disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Thornton

customer_reviews.title: never again
customer_reviews.text: This stuff sucks and you can’t even return it 🤦🏻‍♀️ It’s like it runs to the middle of your nail, even after 2nd coat it’s still see through, & as soon as I tried the black last night, finished up and washed my hands it was already starting to peel! On the plus side it came off super easy -_- would not recommend and would not buy again!
customer_reviews.author: H. Lake

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT LAST; Crappy colors
customer_reviews.text: This product is good for a quick fix. It looks really nice when applied however it lasts less than a week. I am using the same brand base and top coat polish. I bought the gray set and two of the colors look almost identical. There is suppose to be a blue and a gray and they look almost exactly the same. The other set I bought was the classic elegant colors. This one was missing the white all together!! I got two blacks instead. I would say purchase it if you want to wear it for a few days otherwise just invest in the CND brand.
customer_reviews.author: alicia

customer_reviews.title: ... only used the white color so far and wasn't super impressed, it came out really patchy which is ...
customer_reviews.text: I've only used the white color so far and wasn't super impressed, it came out really patchy which is a problem because you can't apply gel colors too thick or else it will never cure.
customer_reviews.author: Kim H

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: I was in a hunt for a gel nail polish that is affordable and would last. I came upon GELLEN and ordered my first product. After using it first time, i instantly fell in love with it and was pleased and amazed of how good of a product this is. Definitely will be ordering more. I can not wait to try all different colors and start playing around with different styles.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Good Colors
customer_reviews.text: Colors look like the pictures. Goes on smoothly and dries with a UV light fine. NONE of the bottles have labels on them to indicate what color is what so I suggest buying some paper labels
customer_reviews.author: Paige Brown

customer_reviews.title: Soooo thin! Have to use 5 coats!
customer_reviews.text: This set was so watered down I have to use 5 coats to make it not see-through. And then it chips within a few days. I've used Gellen polish before and been happy with it, but this set was a joke.
customer_reviews.author: Skittlegirl

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it - can't even tell what colors you received
customer_reviews.text: Really disappointed with this polish. I should have gone with my instincts and OPI. You know it's cheap when the bottles are not even marked with what color they are. I'm not a Salon here - just a person on lock down who now has to try to do this on her own. Gellen you should re-consider and mark your products and color - Doesn't matter as would not buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen Poissant

customer_reviews.title: Great colors that dry well with the lamp (need about ...
customer_reviews.text: Great colors that dry well with the lamp (need about 2-3 minutes under my lamp). Do need around 3 coats to get some of the colors really showing (it can look kinda clear if you don't add enough coats), but once its all done your nails look great! The colors are very true to the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina

customer_reviews.title: Why did I wait so long?!
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, I didn’t have a lot of hope for this polish since the price was so great for the set. First off, I received the polish way faster than the expected delivery date so the shipping was insanely fast! I’ve only ever had gel polish done at the salon so this was my first time doing my own and it was easy peasy! I chose the white and I was very impressed at how pigmented it was. Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Mollie Casey

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: My ONLY complaint is that they did not have a way to distinguish between colors, but I’m starting to see that trend with the gel polishes. Either way, they were a great color set for my fiancé.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Garbage, junk, junk
customer_reviews.text: Garbage. So cheap it literally falls off in a day or two. Very disappointed I missed the return window. I dont want to dump it in the landfill. Going to ask hospital if they will incinerate it along with surrender (unwanted or outdated) medications. Completely useless in every way.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi C

customer_reviews.title: Good product, nice color selection
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful colors but there is no color labeling on the outside of the bottle. You have to open and test each color to be sure you're getting what you want. Other than that, great product.
customer_reviews.author: Angie Jones

customer_reviews.title: Could be better
customer_reviews.text: Saw a couple a of reviews where they said the black bubbled or other colors did and I assumed maybe they were doing something wrong but its like the black doesn't work AT ALL. Every time I put it under the light it started to bubble, I left it under the light for about 5 minutes. Days after the black started to peel and black polish was still wasn't dry! Doesn't even make any sense... Other colors aren't so bad but just turned off of by the quality.
customer_reviews.author: I. Zavala

customer_reviews.title: Never dries out
customer_reviews.text: Worst product ever. I haven't been able to wear it since is impossible to dry, it just keeps being wet after hours of applied. Not recommended.
customer_reviews.author: juan corzo

customer_reviews.title: Vibrant and True!
customer_reviews.text: I love Gellen products. The quality is consistent and the colors are vibrant and true! I am currently building my stock of exclusively Gellen!
customer_reviews.author: Dowisetrepla

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: My 15 yr old daughter loves it. She fakes her nails and this product look great and easy to use
customer_reviews.author: sarah poppen

customer_reviews.title: Lack in Pigment, had to do multiple layers
customer_reviews.text: I rated this product a 2 because it doesnt have much pigment at all. Each color I had to do 3-4 coats of polish, so it's very time consuming. Although I really liked how the purple and the black came out so 2 stars it is.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does not last!
customer_reviews.text: Does not last at all. Painted my nails today and one has already came off. Goes on smooth and consistent but not happy with the longevity of the product. Highly disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Lacey O'Keefe

customer_reviews.title: The shine is beautiful! Did my sisters nails and she couldn't believe ...
customer_reviews.text: These polishes are salon quality! They don't wear or chip for weeks! The shine is beautiful! Did my sisters nails and she couldn't believe how long they lasted on her nails! Now I will be repurchasing for her as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Drea

customer_reviews.title: Goes on nice just doesn’t last long
customer_reviews.text: Goes on nice just doesn’t last long, maybe like a week before it starts to semi peel off in the corners. Gelish works much better but if you’re going with this just put clear coats all over mail to ver corners to make sure they don’t come off. But ok product I still use it just glue it back on if it’s the only one coming off.
customer_reviews.author: Yicel Lechuga

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: Love the colors and they last the two weeks with no scratch
customer_reviews.author: Yan Music

customer_reviews.title: So pretty
customer_reviews.text: This leaves a shiny coat for 3 weeks. I'm not playing. I have to redo them because of growth. I should add that I am a tailor and I'm very hard on my nails and hands.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan house

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, wrong colors
customer_reviews.text: This product is great as far as quality. However it was missing 2 colors out of the 6 I had ordered. I got two tan colors and two white instead of a red and grey which is what I was counting on for Halloween. But other than getting wrong colors it is good quality nail polish if you love gels.
customer_reviews.author: Nails-Hair

customer_reviews.title: Love these colors
customer_reviews.text: These are good. Maybe not Opi quality but they do the work and last at least two weeks (if you are not constantly biting your nails)
customer_reviews.author: XingXhifiQi

customer_reviews.title: Solid colors
customer_reviews.text: Even the lighter, more neutral colors are very solid. No matter the combonation, they all look well together.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Geiman

customer_reviews.title: A+!
customer_reviews.text: I love Gellen polish! The range of colors is great and the quality is A+. I have used many other brands, and Gellen never disappoints!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: Nail polish doesn’t apply very well and peeled off the next day. The black polish ripples and the white polish was streaky. I purchased this one because it was a cheaper alternative to Gelish, needless to say... I will not be purchasing this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Carla Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended this gel nail polish set
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommended this gel nail polish set. It came well packaged and the colours are accurate as shown on the images. They glide on smoothly and are very opaque. I just took a change but I'm glad I did.
customer_reviews.author: Gaurav Amarnani

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love these colors. Great quality gel polish especially for the price!! This is the second set I’ve purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I like the colors, but many coats are needed in order to get deep, full coverage. I don’t hate it, and it’s good for the price.
customer_reviews.author: veronica carrasco

customer_reviews.title: Could be better
customer_reviews.text: I like the black and white, (if you can find the black, the purple comes out looking exactly the same) colors arent as vibrant as the description picture shows.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Such a great deal! I usually use CND shellac but thought ...
customer_reviews.text: Such a great deal! I usually use CND shellac but thought I would give this brand a try because of the reviews. The colors are great and the quality is pretty good as well! Highly recommended!!!
customer_reviews.author: MoDaAmazon

customer_reviews.title: Could be better
customer_reviews.text: The gel starts the chip after a couple of days. The colors are really pretty but the whole purpose of gel is so that the polish doesn’t chip.
customer_reviews.author: Jelenaserb

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my pedicures! Cured great!! Lasting as well, but I have only tried the white. Definitely will buy more colors. Arrived same day!
customer_reviews.author: Keira

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Good product for the price. Wish the colors were on the bottles but other then that I’d recommend
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Great quality at a great price
customer_reviews.text: I use to buy only cnd shellac, it went on nice and lasted 2 weeks no problem, I started trying other brands just out of curiosity and I am absolutely impressed with Gellen! I will be purchasing a lot more!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Way to sheer!!
customer_reviews.text: The picture made these look full color and deep colors. The wine color is more like red and this picture is 3 coats and there were still some sheer spots. Totally not worth the money. Try another brand!
customer_reviews.author: Jnicbee

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it - stick to China Glaze or Gellish.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these thinking they would be a good alternative to salon brands. They are runny, sheer and require too many coats. Mine also peeled off within a few days of applying. Its worth the extra money to buy quality gel polish. Sending these back.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Recommended product 100%
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this few days ago, fast delivery and a good product. I used it to my own nails and it looks so pretty!!! I recommend this product 100%
customer_reviews.author: Jratz

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Pretty colors I would buy again for sure like the brand and the polish lasts for up to 2 weeks
customer_reviews.author: Denise Sabillon

customer_reviews.title: not happy.
customer_reviews.text: I received only 3 colors....doubles of each. So I have 2 whites, 2 blacks, 2 grays. I paid for 6, not happy.
customer_reviews.author: LadyBeth1215

customer_reviews.title: Good Price and Quality
customer_reviews.text: I received my Gellen Classic colors on Monday and decided to try them out right away. The colors are as shown and are easy to apply. It has officially been 7 days since applying the gel polish and it is holding up well. So far they have not chipped or peeled off. I used an LED lamp to cure my nails and this polish cured without any issue. I plan to buy more Gellen in the future in different colors!
customer_reviews.author: ELMoss

customer_reviews.title: Not the greatest
customer_reviews.text: The nail polish is too light, I put 4 coats of grey on and it’s still see through. Also what’s annoying is the bottles are not marked with what color so you have to open each to find which color they are.
customer_reviews.author: Jj

customer_reviews.title: The gel nail would be chipped from the bottom
customer_reviews.text: I have used this gel nail polish with the light purchase from the same seller. Don't know if it's the light problem or the gel nail polish. The gel nail would start bubbly and chipped from the bottom. Then, I would start to peel them off. And it always become a disaster. Done 3 times with different colors. all the same result. I gave up. If I could ask for a refund would be great!
customer_reviews.author: misski0529

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I just bought this nail polish and I love it. Best I have used so far. Dried very fast and I was able to go chop meat in the kitchen right after.
customer_reviews.author: Terence Asongwed

customer_reviews.title: Must have for gel nails
customer_reviews.text: Colors look just like advertised. My nails look like I got them done professionally. Awesome product.
customer_reviews.author: Angelique

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded Expectations
customer_reviews.text: All kinds of yes to this gel nail polish. I can save $60 a month on my nails and it looks spectacular. I use the G&F Beauty base and topcoat with these and it looks and feels exactly like salon quality. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Rupert Knopp

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it - at all
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to receive the gel polish and tey, but I’m very disappointed. All of the polishes were way too thick (like it’s been sitting on the shelf for years). When I tried the black color, it was still sheer, even with 2 coats. Overall, very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Lea Lin

customer_reviews.title: nice colors
customer_reviews.text: i like the color butwould nice of the paint color was displayed on the outside of the bottle
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You might as well buy a can of paint. Don't waste your money!!
customer_reviews.text: Omg. This is actual paint. Like regular paint like... I went to sherwin williams and bought a can of paint and put it in a nail polish box kinda thing. This is BS. Its a waste of money. Honestly
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great durable gel polish
customer_reviews.text: I received the set of nail polishes on time. I applied the reddish pink polish and it went on smoothly and evenly. The next day I had to pack up the office of a retiring doctor so my nails received a heavy beating and much to my shock and joy, there was not one chip or imperfection after that. It even continued to last over a week with some pretty hefty abuse to my nails. I will definitely be buying from them again.
customer_reviews.author: Alexa

customer_reviews.title: It stays better than regular nail polish.
customer_reviews.text: First of all, it took a long time to get to me. It was supposed to be prime but it took over a week. Once I finally got it, it went on smooth but has already started chipping (which could be my fault because I might not have put enough top coat). Just be aware it's not as good as other products, but it looks nice!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Clumpy and doesn’t cure correctly!
customer_reviews.text: I just bought these and got them today. I went off of the many good reviews this polish had and was very disappointed! This polish is clumpy when you apply it and it doesn’t cure right under the UV Lamp. I am a cosmetologist and have done gel nails for many years and I have never received polish like this before. Would not recommend to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Barry

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: The polish is thin and doesn’t go on as smoothly as other brands I’ve used.
customer_reviews.author: Shiessica

customer_reviews.title: Looks professional
customer_reviews.text: The colors are exactly as shown and they apply so smoothly! Looks like a professional no chip!!
customer_reviews.author: Meghan Weisgerber

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn't buy again
customer_reviews.text: Its a little thick and the red i got the brush was broken so its unusable
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: This product works great and I love the color options in this pack
customer_reviews.text: Just started doing my own gel nails. This product works great and I love the color options in this pack.
customer_reviews.author: Shaine

product_meta.title: Gellen Gel Nail Polish Set - Classic Elegance 6 Colors, Popular Black White Grays Wine Purple Nail Art Colors UV LED Soak Off Nail Gel Manicure Beginner Kit
feature_bullets: On like polish, Wears like Gel, Off in minutes, Mirror shine finish
With a proper application, 2 WEEKS+ wearing is attainable.
Environment-friendly products with healthy ingredients, low smell, NON-TOXIC
Made from natural resin, wears like gel, good tenacity.
REMINDER: Cure under LED/UV light CURE TIME: Average for LED light 30-60 secs, UV light 2-4mins.
